name.description: Name that identifies this Knowledge Center.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Knowledge Center.

description.description: Description of the Knowledge Center instance.

reviewers.description: User references of the reviewers for this Knowledge Center.

mutuallyExclusive.description: Knowledge Center documents that are direct children in this Knowledge Center are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` only one document can be used to label an entity. When mutually exclusive is `false`, multiple documents from this group can be used to label an entity.

domain.description: Fully qualified name of the domain the Knowledge Center belongs to.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
